Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.1 Paṭiccavāra » 23.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
28.
2998Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekavīsa…pe…  jhāne ekavīsa, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekavīsa, atthiyā ekavīsa, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekavīsa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2999Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
Paṭiccavāro.
